```{r}
ggplot(gss_cat,aes(x=rincome))+
```

The prolem is that the categorial variable is not ordered.  this can be fixed by using fct_infreq():




One way to fix it 

```{r}
ggplot(gss_cat, aes(x = fct_infreq(rincome))) + 
  geom_bar() + 
  coord_flip()
```
